column1: Well you only need the light when it's burning low
column2: 只有在朦胧黯淡时才念及灯火光亮
column3: Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
column4: 只有在冰天雪地时才怀念阳光温暖
column5: Only know you love her when you let her go
column6: 只有在已然放手后才始知那是真爱
column7: Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
column8: 只有在身处低谷时才遥想过去峥嵘
column9: Only hate the road when you're missing home
column10: 只有在乡愁涌动时才痛恨旅途遥远
column11: Only know you love her when you let her go
column12: 只有在让她走之后才始知那是真爱
column16: Staring at the bottom of your glass
column18: Hoping one day you'll make a dream last
column19: 希望有一天，你能让梦持续。
column20: But dreams come slow and they go so fast
column21: 但是梦想来的太慢，走得太快
column22: You see her when you close your eyes
column23: 闭上双眼，整个脑海都是你。
